description: Process T1w anatomical images to generate an imitation T2w-contrast image

t1_file.title: Input T1w File
t1_file.description: Full name of the input T1w volume

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Output prefix for files and snapshots

workdir.title: Working Directory
workdir.description: Specify a working directory, which can be removed (default: __WORKING_imit2w_from_t1w)

mask.title: Pre-skullstripped Mask
mask.description: Optional input of a pre-skullstripped T1_FILE (either mask or skull-stripped volume)

ss_blur_fwhm.title: Skull Strip Blur FWHM
ss_blur_fwhm.description: Optional, add in blurring during the 3dSkullStrip part (in mm, default: 2 FWHM)

no_clean.title: No Clean
no_clean.description: Optional switch to NOT remove working directory '__WORKING_imit2w_from_t1w' (default: remove working dir)

no_qc_view.title: No QC View
no_qc_view.description: Turn off the automatic creation of QC montages (default: on)

qc_prefix.title: QC Image Prefix
qc_prefix.description: Change the prefix of the QC images (default: use prefix of volumes)
